Shield Dwarf is a Subrace of Dwarf in Baldur's Gate 3. Shield Dwarf has both Medium and Light Armor Proficiencies. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races. Each of them has their special characteristi
